modules.description: Generates cryptographic keys from passwords using the scrypt algorithm, performing memory-intensive computations and salted hashing. It operates on byte sequences and integers, handling large values required for key stretching. Used to securely derive encryption keys from user-provided passwords in authentication systems.

Derives secret keys from a password and salt using the scrypt algorithm, with parameters controlling computational and memory costs. Accepts byte strings for password and salt, and integer parameters for cost, parallelization, and desired key length. Used for securely generating cryptographic keys from user-provided secrets in applications requiring resistance to hardware-based attacks.
